subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Signing a deal that made him the highest-paid defensive player in N.F.L.history, Nate Clements agreed to an eight-year, $80 million contract with the San Francisco 49ers Friday
snippet: Signing a deal that made him the highest-paid defensive player in N.F.L.history, Nate Clements agreed to an eight-year, $80 million contract with the San Francisco 49ers Friday
